title: Arenya: Astral
description: Arenya is a restless journalist stuck writing viral fluff-until a string of sudden, unexplained deaths sparks her curiosity. As she digs deeper, patterns begin to emerge, pointing toward something far stranger than she anticipated. Set in a sharply modern San Francisco, this slow-burning mystery blends realism with echoes of the uncanny, hinting at forces long buried-and quietly stirring.
